/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Modern skyscrapers tower over older, more traditional structures, reflecting the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban setting. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
